doc.author: 黄维
doc.description: 对工单字段修改记录的查询

sqlquery.name: BaseFieldModifyLog.BaseOn_OneProcessSelect
sqlquery.select:
select /*COUNT*/ C1 as ModifyLog_ID, C700021001 as ModifyLog_BaseID, C700021002 as ModifyLog_BaseSchema, C700021003 as ModifyLog_PhaseNo, C700021004 as ModifyLog_field_ID, C700021005 as ModifyLog_Date, C700021006 as ModifyLog_FieldDBName, C700021007 as ModifyLog_DealerID, C700021008 as ModifyLog_Dealer, C700021009 as ModifyLog_OldValue, C700021010 as ModifyLog_NewValue, C700021011 as ModifyLog_ProcessType, C700021012 as ModifyLog_ShowName, C700021013 as ModifyLog_ProcessID, C700021014 as ModifyLog_ProcessLogID, C700021015 as ModifyLog_Type, C700021016 as ModifyLog_TypeValue
/*COUNT*/ from {WF:App_Base_FieldModifyLog} Base_FieldModifyLog where $BaseOn_OneProcessSelect$ $orderby$
